tool_description: Logs and manages all emergency communications including radio transmissions, status updates, and inter-agency messages with audit trail capability.

communication_type.description: Type: radio_dispatch, status_update, unit_to_unit, hospital_contact, inter_agency

error_messages: Invalid communication type: Use radio_dispatch, status_update, unit_to_unit, hospital_contact, or inter_agency
Empty message content: Communication message cannot be empty
Invalid sender/recipient: Sender and recipient IDs must be different and valid
Call ID not found: Associated call must exist in system
Message too long: Communication content exceeds maximum allowed length
usage: Log all emergency communications with sender, recipient, and message details for audit and coordination purposes.

log_entry_id.description: Unique identifier for this communication log

retention_period.description: Number of days this log will be retained
